text:
Company Background:

Blair-Brown is a renowned technology firm dedicated to innovation and excellence. We celebrate the diversity of our employees and the communities we serve, and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all.

Job Type: Full-time

Job Description:

Blair-Brown is seeking a talented Technical Writer to join our team. The successful candidate will work closely with our engineers and designers to document complex technical processes and create user manuals, guides, and other documentation.

Responsibilities:

- Develop comprehensive technical documentation for new and existing products.
- Collaborate with engineers, developers, and product managers to gather information.
- Edit and standardize materials prepared by other writers or personnel.
- Ensure all documentation meets company standards and is easily understood by users.
- Maintain and update documentation as products evolve.

Qualifications and Experience Needed:

- Bachelor’s degree in Technical Writing, English, Communications, or a related field.
- Proven experience as a technical writer, preferably in the technology sector.
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
- Strong attention to detail and ability to work independently.
- Familiarity with documentation tools and software.

Perks and Benefits:

- Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance.
- Paid parental leave for both primary and secondary caregivers.
- We are committed to fair and equitable pay practices. The salary for this position ranges from $50,000 to $75,000, based on your experience and skills.
- Opportunities for professional development and career advancement.
- Flexible work hours and remote work options.
- Inclusive and supportive work environment that values diverse perspectives and experiences.
